title: RIOT FIX THE GAME PLZ
body:
Now if you don't know adc's are op as fuck now and vs a tanks its never been worse hear are the stats.

now if you get a {{item:3036}} if a tank with 3k hp which is normal you will do with just this over 400 damage with just 1 basic attack add that with {{item:3153}} {{item:1300}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3094}} you will do a crit for 1500 ad damage and 300 ap damage if {{item:3094}} has its passive.

Now this would not be so bad if you did not nerf every ap champ in the game 
what's that good sir you wont a burst champion ok just go adc mid, adc top, adc jg, adc sup and adc.

If we could just play a champ like {{champion:7}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:1}} so on and not have to be 50 minutes into the game to burst a adc then it would be fine with just {{item:3508}} {{item:3094}} you get 30% cd, 50% crit and you have it at 15 minutes were as if you wont to go any burst champ that's not zed you need {{item:3003}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3020}} just to do a dent and it will take you 30 min to get it all.

And don't even get me started on masteries fever of battle gives 80 ad as a basic attack at lv 18  
warlocks blood lust gives hp for criting and a normal adc build will get you 60% crit at 25 min then you get to heal with no life steal.

Now lets look at ap 
deathfire touch  your damaging ability's cause enemy champions to take MAGIC DAMEGE equal to 6+50% of your bonus ATTACK DAMEGE and 20% of your ABILITY POWER
ow so that's for champs like {{champion:114}} {{champion:107}} so on to make it harder to build TANK and giving them MIX DAMEGE 
ok I know we can find 1 lets look............... ok I found it
thunderlord's decree every 3rd basic attack or ability will brings a lightning bolt down to the ground to deal MAGIC DAMEGE equal to 10 per lv, plus 20% of ATTACK DAMEGE and 10% of ABILIITY POWER [20 second Cooldown]  this looks like deathfire touch only worst.

And the worst thing yet if you were to nerf the things making champs like {{champion:104}} {{champion:67}} so on to make tank champs work they would become stupid as you can see with {{champion:36}}  atm with his grasp of the undying giving him hp back wen he basic attacks.

What needs to happing riot is you need to nerf the mastery's that makes adc's so powerful or buff the ap and tank chaps with mastery's and items 
as if you just nerf 1 champ another will take its place look at {{champion:67}} if you nerf her then {{champion:51}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:21}} will take her place.

This is all I have to say I hope that someone from riot will see this and read and improve on this wonderful game.
